dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3419 IH: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the telehealth network and telehealth resource centers grant programs.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Valadao (for himself and Mr. Gray) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to reauthorize the telehealth network and telehealth resource centers grant programs.

section.header: Reauthorization of telehealth network and telehealth resource centers grant programs
section.text: Section 330I(q) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254c–14(q)) is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking section and inserting the following:
in paragraph (1), as so inserted, by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and; and
by adding at the end the following:
$42,050,000 for each of fiscal years 2026 through 2030.
